abstract.para: Apart from local clusters and metro area clusters, &productnamereg; &productnumber; also supports &geo.dispersed; clusters (&geo; clusters, sometimes also called multi-site clusters). That means you can have multiple, &geo.dispersed; sites with a local cluster each. Failover between these clusters is coordinated by a higher level entity, the so-called booth. For details on how to use and set up &geo; clusters, refer to and .
